member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /Teacher { "firstName": "Jon", - First name of teacher "lastName": "Testman", - Last name of teacher "gender": true, - Gernder of teacher. 1 - Male, 0 - Female "email": "jon.testman@gmail.com", - Teacher email "phone": "123456789" - Teacher phone }
